description: This file defines an Angular component named DividerComponent, which provides a customizable horizontal divider UI element for section separation, with configurable color and margin props.

classes.name: DividerComponent
classes.description: An Angular component for rendering a styled horizontal divider with customizable color and margin.

methods.name: hostClass
methods.description: Returns the CSS class string for the host element, incorporating the margin style.

methods.name: style
methods.description: Provides inline style object for the component, specifically for setting the divider color.
